data.eml:eml: A new species of the spider genus Solenysa from China (Araneae, Linyphiidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Tian, Jiahui, Tu, Lihong (2018): A new species of the spider genus Solenysa from China (Araneae, Linyphiidae). Zootaxa 4531 (1): 142-146, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4531.1.10
